import React from "react"; import Dropdown from "react-bootstrap/Dropdown"; import { BsPlayCircleFill as Play, BsFillPauseCircleFill as Pause, } from "react-icons/bs"; import { BiSkipNext as Next, BiSkipPrevious as Prev } from "react-icons/bi"; import { RiSpeedFill as Speed } from "react-icons/ri"; const AudioControls = ({ isPlaying, onPlayPauseClick, onPrevClick, onNextClick, showNextButton, changeSpeed, }) => (
{isPlaying ? ( ) : ( )} changeSpeed(e.target.innerHTML)} value="0.5" > 0.5 changeSpeed(e.target.innerHTML)} value="1" > 1 changeSpeed(e.target.innerHTML)} value="1.5" > 1.5 changeSpeed(e.target.innerHTML)} value="2" > 2
); export default AudioControls;
